body.p: A co‑operative entity has issued shares to its members at different dates and for different amounts in the past as follows:

li.p: 1 January 20X2 100,000 shares at CU20 each (a further CU2,000,000, so that the total for shares issued is CU3,000,000).

body.p: Shares are redeemable on demand at the amount for which they were issued.
